00022 void eol_mesh_init()
00023 {
00024   eol_logger_message(
00025     EOL_LOG_INFO,
00026     "eol_mesh:initializing\n"
00027   );
00028   if (_eol_mesh_list != NULL)return;
00029   _eol_mesh_list = (eolMesh *)malloc(
00030       sizeof(eolMesh) * _eol_mesh_max
00031   );
00032   memset(
00033       _eol_mesh_list,
00034       0,
00035       sizeof(eolMesh) * _eol_mesh_max
00036   );
00037   atexit(eol_mesh_close);
00038   _eol_mesh_initialized = eolTrue;
00039   _eol_mesh_shader_program =
00040     eol_shader_load_program("shaders/lighting1.vert",
00041                             "shaders/lighting1.frag");
00042   eol_logger_message(
00043     EOL_LOG_INFO,
00044     "eol_mesh:initialized\n"
00045   );
00046 }

00048 eolBool eol_mesh_initialized()
00049 {
00050   return _eol_mesh_initialized;

00053 void eol_mesh_delete(eolMesh *mesh)
00054 {
00055   int i;
00056   if (mesh == NULL)return;
00057   if (mesh->_rest != NULL)
00058   {
00059     free(mesh->_rest);
00060     mesh->_rest = NULL;
00061   }
00062   if (mesh->_vertices != NULL)
00063   {
00064     free(mesh->_vertices);
00065     mesh->_vertices = NULL;
00066   }
00067   if (mesh->_normals != NULL)
00068   {
00069     free(mesh->_normals);
00070     mesh->_normals = NULL;
00071   }
00072   if (mesh->_texels != NULL)
00073   {
00074     free(mesh->_texels);
00075     mesh->_texels = NULL;
00076   }
00077   if (mesh->_faces != NULL)
00078   {
00079     free(mesh->_faces);
00080     mesh->_faces = NULL;
00081   }
00082   if (mesh->_groups != NULL)
00083   {
00084     for (i = 0;i < mesh->_numGroups; i++)
00085     {
00086       if (mesh->_groups[i].vertices != NULL)
00087       {
00088         free(mesh->_groups[i].vertices);
00089       }
00090       if (mesh->_groups[i].weights != NULL)
00091       {
00092         free(mesh->_groups[i].weights);
00093       }
00094     }
00095     free(mesh->_groups);
00096     mesh->_groups = NULL;
00097   }
00098   /*
00099    * TODO: handle deleting the buffer arrays
00100   eolUint _vertexArray;
00101   eolUint _normalArray;
00102   eolUint _texelArray;
00103    */
00104   memset(mesh,0,sizeof(eolMesh));
00105 }

00107 void eol_mesh_close()
00108 {
00109   int i = 0;
00110     eol_logger_message(
00111     EOL_LOG_INFO,
00112     "eol_mesh:closing\n"
00113   );
00114 
00115   if (_eol_mesh_list != NULL)
00116   {
00117     for (i = 0;i < _eol_mesh_max;i++)
00118     {
00119       eol_mesh_delete(&_eol_mesh_list[i]);
00120     }
00121   }
00122   _eol_mesh_list = NULL;
00123   _eol_mesh_initialized = eolFalse;
00124     eol_logger_message(
00125     EOL_LOG_INFO,
00126     "eol_mesh:closed\n"
00127   );
00128 
00129 }

00137 eolMesh * eol_mesh_new()
00138 {
00139   int i;
00140   if (!eol_mesh_initialized())
00141   {
00142     eol_logger_message(EOL_LOG_ERROR,"eol_mesh:not initialized\n");
00143     return NULL;
00144   }
00145   for (i = 0; i < _eol_mesh_max;i++)
00146   {
00147     if (_eol_mesh_list[i]._refCount == 0)
00148     {
00149       _eol_mesh_list[i]._refCount = 1;
00150       return &_eol_mesh_list[i];
00151     }
00152   }
00153   eol_logger_message(EOL_LOG_WARN,"eol_mesh: out of space for new mesh data.\n");
00154   return NULL;
00155 }
00156 
00157 void eol_mesh_free(eolMesh **mesh)
00158 {
00159   if (!eol_mesh_initialized())return;
00160   if ((mesh == NULL) ||
00161      (*mesh == NULL) ||
00162      ((*mesh)->_refCount == 0))return;
00163   (*mesh)->_refCount--;
00164   *mesh = NULL;
00165 }

00167 /*Load mesh data from object file and store the information in the provided mesh
00168  * structure*/
00169 void eol_mesh_load_from_object(char *filename,eolMesh *model)
00170 {
00171   eolFile *file;
00172   file = eol_loader_read_file(filename);
00173 
00174   if (file == NULL)
00175     return;
00176 
00177   strcpy(model->filename,filename);
00178 
00179   eol_mesh_object_get_counts(model,file->file);
00180 /*TODO add more memory checks for allocation*/
00181   if(model->_numVertices != 0)
00182   {
00183     model->_vertices = (eolVec3D*)malloc(sizeof(eolVec3D)*(model->_numVertices));
00184     memset(model->_vertices,0,sizeof(eolVec3D)*(model->_numVertices));
00185     model->_rest = (eolVec3D*)malloc(sizeof(eolVec3D)*(model->_numVertices));
00186     memset(model->_rest,0,sizeof(eolVec3D)*(model->_numVertices));
00187   }
00188 
00189   if(model->_numNormals != 0)
00190   {
00191     model->_normals = (eolVec3D*)malloc(sizeof(eolVec3D)*(model->_numNormals));
00192     memset(model->_normals,0,sizeof(eolVec3D)*(model->_numNormals));
00193   }
00194 
00195   if(model->_numTexels != 0)
00196   {
00197     model->_texels = (eolVert2D*)malloc(sizeof(eolVert2D)*(model->_numTexels));
00198     memset(model->_texels,0,sizeof(eolVert2D)*(model->_numTexels));
00199   }
00200 
00201   if(model->_numFaces != 0)
00202   {
00203     model->_faces = (eolFace*)malloc(sizeof(eolFace)*(model->_numFaces));
00204     memset(model->_faces,0,sizeof(eolFace)*(model->_numFaces));
00205   }
00206 
00207   eol_mesh_get_mesh_from_object_file(model,file->file);
00208 
00209   memcpy(model->_rest,model->_vertices,sizeof(eolVec3D)*model->_numVertices);
00210   model->_curFrame = -1;
00211   eol_mesh_get_groups(model, file->file);
00212 
00213   eol_loader_close_file(&file);
00214 }
00215 
00216 void eol_mesh_object_get_counts(eolMesh* model, FILE* file)
00217 {
00218   char buf[128];
00219   int  numvertices = 0;
00220   int  numnormals = 0;
00221   int  numtexcoords = 0;
00222   int  numfaces = 0;
00223 
00224   if ((file == NULL) ||
00225      (model == NULL))
00226   {
00227     return;
00228   }
00229 
00230   while(fscanf(file, "%s", buf) != EOF)
00231   {
00232     switch(buf[0])
00233     {
00234       case 'v':
00235         switch(buf[1])
00236         {
00237           case '\0':
00238             fgets(buf, sizeof(buf), file);
00239             numvertices++;
00240             break;
00241           case 'n':
00242             fgets(buf, sizeof(buf), file);
00243             numnormals++;
00244             break;
00245           case 't':
00246             fgets(buf, sizeof(buf), file);
00247             numtexcoords++;
00248             break;
00249           default:
00250             break;
00251         }
00252         break;
00253       case 'f':
00254         fgets(buf, sizeof(buf), file);
00255         numfaces++;
00256         break;
00257       default:
00258         fgets(buf, sizeof(buf), file);
00259         break;
00260     }
00261   }
00262   model->_numVertices  = numvertices;
00263   model->_numNormals   = numnormals;
00264   model->_numTexels = numtexcoords;
00265   model->_numFaces = numfaces;
00266 }
00267 
00268 void eol_mesh_get_mesh_from_object_file(eolMesh * model, FILE* file)
00269 {
00270   int  numvertices = 0;
00271   int  numnormals = 0;
00272   int  numtexcoords = 0;
00273   int  numfaces = 0;
00274   char buf[128];
00275   eolVec3D bounds = {0,0,0};
00276   float x,y,z;
00277 
00278   if (file == NULL)
00279     return;
00280   rewind(file);
00281   while(fscanf(file, "%s", buf) != EOF)
00282   {
00283     switch(buf[0])
00284     {
00285       case 'v':
00286         switch(buf[1])
00287         {
00288           case '\0':
00289             fscanf(
00290                 file,
00291                 "%f %f %f",
00292                 &x,
00293                 &y,
00294                 &z
00295               );
00296             model->_vertices[numvertices].x = x;
00297             model->_vertices[numvertices].y = y;
00298             model->_vertices[numvertices].z = z;
00299             if (fabs(x) > bounds.x)bounds.x = fabs(x);
00300             if (fabs(y) > bounds.x)bounds.y = fabs(y);
00301             if (fabs(z) > bounds.x)bounds.z = fabs(z);
00302             numvertices++;
00303             break;
00304           case 'n':
00305             fscanf(
00306                 file,
00307                 "%f %f %f",
00308                 &x,
00309                 &y,
00310                 &z
00311             );
00312             model->_normals[numnormals].x = x;
00313             model->_normals[numnormals].y = y;
00314             model->_normals[numnormals].z = z;
00315             numnormals++;
00316             break;
00317           case 't':
00318             fscanf(
00319                 file,
00320                 "%f %f",
00321                 &model->_texels[numtexcoords][0],
00322                 &model->_texels[numtexcoords][1]
00323               );
00324             model->_texels[numtexcoords][1] = 1 - model->_texels[numtexcoords][1];
00325             numtexcoords++;
00326             break;
00327           default:
00328             break;
00329         }
00330         break;
00331       case 'f':
00332         fscanf(
00333             file,
00334             "%d/%d/%d %d/%d/%d %d/%d/%d",
00335             &model->_faces[numfaces].vertices[0],
00336             &model->_faces[numfaces].texels[0],
00337             &model->_faces[numfaces].normals[0],
00338             &model->_faces[numfaces].vertices[1],
00339             &model->_faces[numfaces].texels[1],
00340             &model->_faces[numfaces].normals[1],
00341             &model->_faces[numfaces].vertices[2],
00342             &model->_faces[numfaces].texels[2],
00343             &model->_faces[numfaces].normals[2]);
00344         model->_faces[numfaces].vertices[0]--;
00345         model->_faces[numfaces].texels[0]--;
00346         model->_faces[numfaces].normals[0]--;
00347         model->_faces[numfaces].vertices[1]--;
00348         model->_faces[numfaces].texels[1]--;
00349         model->_faces[numfaces].normals[1]--;
00350         model->_faces[numfaces].vertices[2]--;
00351         model->_faces[numfaces].texels[2]--;
00352         model->_faces[numfaces].normals[2]--;
00353         numfaces++;
00354         break;
00355       default:
00356         fgets(buf, sizeof(buf), file);
00357         break;
00358     }
00359   }
00360   eol_vec3d_copy(model->bounds,bounds);
00361 }
00362 
00363 void eol_mesh_get_groups(eolMesh *model, FILE *file)
00364 {
00365   eolBool badload = eolFalse;
00366   eolLine buf;
00367   eolLine name;
00368   eolInt numgroups = 0;
00369   eolInt i = 0,g = 0;
00370   eolFloat weight = 0;
00371   eolGroup * group = NULL;
00372 
00373   if ((model == NULL) ||
00374       (file == NULL))
00375   {
00376     return;
00377   }
00378   rewind(file);
00379   while(fscanf(file, "%s", buf) != EOF)
00380   {
00381     if(strcmp(buf,"vgroupcount:") == 0)
00382     {
00383       fscanf(file, "%i",&numgroups);
00384       break;
00385     }
00386   }
00387   /*check if this model has any bones to handle.*/
00388   if (numgroups == 0)
00389     return;
00390   model->_numGroups = numgroups;
00391   model->_groups = (eolGroup *)malloc(sizeof(eolGroup)*numgroups);
00392   if (model->_groups == NULL)
00393   {
00394     eol_logger_message(
00395       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00396       "eol_mesh: unable to allocate memory for mesh groups.\n"
00397     );
00398     free(model->_groups);
00399     model->_groups = NULL;
00400     model->_numGroups = 0;
00401     return;
00402   }
00403   memset(model->_groups,0,sizeof(eolGroup)*numgroups);
00404 
00405   /*now we name all of the groups*/
00406   rewind(file);
00407   g = 0;
00408   while(fscanf(file, "%s", buf) != EOF)
00409   {
00410     if(strcmp(buf,"vgroup:") == 0)
00411     {
00412       fscanf(file, "%s",model->_groups[g].name);
00413       g++;
00414       continue;
00415     }
00416     if(strcmp(buf,"groupname:") == 0)
00417     {
00418       fscanf(file, "%s",name);
00419       group = eol_mesh_get_group_by_name(name,model);
00420       if (group != NULL)
00421       {
00422         group->numVerts++;
00423       }
00424     }
00425   }
00426   /*now allocate vertex and weight information for each group*/
00427   for (i = 0; i < g;i++)
00428   {
00429     model->_groups[i].vertices =
00430        (eolInt *)malloc(sizeof(eolInt)*model->_groups[i].numVerts);
00431     model->_groups[i].weights =
00432        (eolFloat *)malloc(sizeof(eolFloat)*model->_groups[i].numVerts);
00433     if ((model->_groups[i].vertices == NULL) ||
00434         (model->_groups[i].weights == NULL))
00435     {
00436       badload = eolTrue;
00437       break;
00438     }
00439     memset(model->_groups[i].vertices,0,sizeof(eolInt)*model->_groups[i].numVerts);
00440     memset(model->_groups[i].weights,0,sizeof(eolFloat)*model->_groups[i].numVerts);
00441   }
00442   if (badload)
00443   {
00444     eol_logger_message(
00445       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00446       "eol_mesh: unable to allocate group vertices/weights\n");
00447     for (i = 0; i < g;i++)
00448     {
00449       if (model->_groups[i].vertices != NULL)
00450       {
00451           free(model->_groups[i].vertices);
00452       }
00453       if (model->_groups[i].weights != NULL)
00454       {
00455         free(model->_groups[i].weights);
00456       }
00457     }
00458     free (model->_groups);
00459     model->_groups = NULL;
00460     model->_numGroups = 0;
00461   }
00462 
00463   /* now to go through and assign the information*/
00464   rewind(file);
00465   g = 0;
00466   i =  -1;
00467   group = NULL;
00468   while(fscanf(file, "%s", buf) != EOF)
00469   {
00470     if(strcmp(buf,"groupname:") == 0)/*select active bone for addition*/
00471     {
00472       fscanf(file, "%s",name);
00473       group = eol_mesh_get_group_by_name(name,model);
00474       if (group != NULL)
00475       {
00476         group->vertices[group->_assignedV] = i;
00477         group->_assignedV++;
00478       }
00479       continue;
00480     }
00481     if(strcmp(buf,"weight:") == 0)/*select active bone for addition*/
00482     {
00483       if (group != NULL)
00484       {
00485         fscanf(file,"%f",&weight);
00486         group->weights[group->_assignedW] = weight;
00487         group->_assignedW++;
00488       }
00489       continue;
00490     }
00491     if((buf[0] == 'v') && (buf[1] == '\0'))
00492     {
00493       i++;
00494       continue;
00495     }
00496   }
00497 /*
00498   TODO: fix the deformation so this makes sense
00499 eol_mesh_normalize_group_weights(model);
00500 */
00501 }
00502 
00503 eolGroup * eol_mesh_get_group_by_name(char *name,eolMesh *model)
00504 {
00505   int g;
00506   if ((name == NULL) ||
00507       (model == NULL))
00508   {
00509     return NULL;
00510   }
00511   for (g = 0; g < model->_numGroups;g++)
00512   {
00513     if (strcmp(model->_groups[g].name,name) == 0)
00514     {
00515       return &model->_groups[g];
00516     }
00517   }
00518   eol_logger_message(
00519     EOL_LOG_WARN,
00520     "eol_mesh:unable to find group: %s in mesh: %s\n",name,model->filename);
00521   return NULL;
00522 }
00523 
00524 eolMesh * eol_mesh_get_by_filename(char *filename)
00525 {
00526   int i;
00527   if (!eol_mesh_initialized())
00528     return NULL;
00529   if (filename == NULL)
00530     return NULL;
00531   for (i = 0;i < _eol_mesh_max;i++)
00532   {
00533     if ((_eol_mesh_list[i]._refCount > 0) &&
00534         (strcmp(_eol_mesh_list[i].filename,filename)==0))
00535     {
00536       _eol_mesh_list[i]._refCount++;
00537       return &_eol_mesh_list[i];
00538     }
00539   }
00540   return NULL;
00541 }
00542 
00543 eolMesh * eol_mesh_load(char *filename)
00544 {
00545   eolMesh *mesh = NULL;
00546   if (!eol_mesh_initialized())
00547   {
00548     eol_logger_message(
00549       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00550       "eol_mesh: used uninitialized\n"
00551     );
00552     return NULL;
00553   }
00554   mesh = eol_mesh_get_by_filename(filename);
00555   if (mesh != NULL)
00556     return mesh;
00557   mesh = eol_mesh_new();
00558   if (mesh == NULL)return NULL;
00559   /*TODO: support loading from binary file*/
00560   eol_mesh_load_from_object(filename,mesh);
00561   return mesh;
00562 }
00563 
00564 eolGroup *
00565 eol_mesh_get_next_group_for_vert(
00566     eolFloat **weight,
00567     eolMesh  *mesh,
00568     eolGroup *group,
00569     int       vindex
00570   )
00571 {
00572   int i;
00573   if (mesh == NULL)
00574   {
00575     eol_logger_warn(
00576       "eol_mesh: passed null parameter in get_group_for_vert\n");
00577     return NULL;
00578   }
00579   if (group == NULL)
00580   {
00581     group = &mesh->_groups[0];
00582   }
00583   else
00584   {
00585     group++;
00586   }
00587   while (group < &mesh->_groups[mesh->_numGroups])
00588   {
00589     if (group == NULL)
00590     {
00591       eol_logger_message(
00592         EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00593         "eol_mesh:bad group for mesh %s\n",
00594         mesh->filename
00595         );
00596       break;
00597     }
00598     for (i = 0;i < group->numVerts;i++)
00599     {
00600       if (group->vertices[i] == vindex)
00601       {
00602         if (weight != NULL)
00603           *weight = &group->weights[i];
00604         return group;
00605       }
00606     }
00607     group++;
00608   }
00609   return NULL;
00610 }
00611 
00612 void eol_mesh_normalize_group_weights(eolMesh *mesh)
00613 {
00614   int v;
00615   int count = 0;
00616   eolDouble m = 0;
00617   eolFloat *weight = NULL;
00618   eolGroup *gtemp = NULL;
00619   GList *grouplist = NULL;
00620   GList *glIt = NULL;
00621   if (mesh == NULL)
00622   {
00623     eol_logger_warn(
00624       "eol_mesh: passed null parameter in normalize_group_weights\n");
00625     return;
00626   }
00627   for (v = 0; v < mesh->_numVertices; v++)
00628   {
00629     m = 0;
00630     count = 0;
00631     gtemp = eol_mesh_get_next_group_for_vert(&weight,mesh,NULL,v);
00632     while (gtemp != NULL)
00633     {
00634       grouplist = g_list_append(grouplist,weight);
00635       m += (*weight * *weight);
00636       count++;
00637       gtemp = eol_mesh_get_next_group_for_vert(&weight,mesh,gtemp,v);
00638     }
00639     if ((count > 1) && (m != 0))
00640     {
00641       m = 1/sqrt(m);
00642       glIt = grouplist;
00643       while (glIt != NULL)
00644       {
00645         weight = (eolFloat *)glIt->data;
00646         *weight = *weight * m;
00647         glIt = g_list_next(glIt);
00648       }
00649     }
00650     g_list_free(grouplist);
00651     grouplist = NULL;
00652   }
00653 }
00654 
00655 void eol_mesh_draw(
00656     eolMesh *mesh,
00657     eolVec3D position,
00658     eolVec3D rotation,
00659     eolVec3D scale,
00660     eolVec3D color,
00661     eolFloat alpha,
00662     eolSprite *skin
00663   )
00664 {
00665   int i;
00666   eolFace* triangle;
00667   float trans[4];
00668 
00669   if (mesh == NULL)
00670   {
00671     return;
00672   }
00673   glPushMatrix();
00674   trans[3] = alpha;
00675   trans[0] = color.x;
00676   trans[1] = color.y;
00677   trans[2] = color.z;
00678 
00679   glColorMaterial(GL_FRONT,GL_DIFFUSE);
00680   glEnable(GL_NORMALIZE);
00681   glEnable(GL_LIGHTING);
00682   glEnable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL);
00683   glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA,GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00684   glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00685 
00686   glDepthFunc(GL_LEQUAL);
00687 
00688   if(skin != NULL)
00689   {
00690     glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00691     glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D,skin->_glImage);
00692   }
00693 
00694   glMaterialfv(GL_FRONT,GL_DIFFUSE,trans);
00695 
00696   glTranslatef(position.x,position.y,position.z);
00697   glRotatef(rotation.x, 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00698   glRotatef(rotation.y, 0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f);
00699   glRotatef(rotation.z, 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00700   glScalef(scale.x,scale.y,scale.z);
00701 
00702   glColor3f(color.x,color.y,color.z);
00703 
00704   if (glUseProgram != NULL)
00705   {
00706     glUseProgram(_eol_mesh_shader_program);
00707     if ((glUniform1i != NULL) && (glGetUniformLocation != NULL))
00708     {
00709       glUniform1i(glGetUniformLocation(_eol_mesh_shader_program, "colorMap"), 0);
00710     }
00711   }
00712   
00713   glBegin(GL_TRIANGLES);
00714   for (i = 0; i < mesh->_numFaces; i++)
00715   {
00716     triangle = &mesh->_faces[i];
00717     glNormal3f(mesh->_normals[triangle->normals[0]].x,
00718                mesh->_normals[triangle->normals[0]].y,
00719                mesh->_normals[triangle->normals[0]].z);
00720     glTexCoord2fv(mesh->_texels[triangle->texels[0]]);
00721     glVertex3f(mesh->_vertices[triangle->vertices[0]].x,
00722                mesh->_vertices[triangle->vertices[0]].y,
00723                mesh->_vertices[triangle->vertices[0]].z);
00724 
00725     glNormal3f(mesh->_normals[triangle->normals[1]].x,
00726                mesh->_normals[triangle->normals[1]].y,
00727                mesh->_normals[triangle->normals[1]].z);
00728     glTexCoord2fv(mesh->_texels[triangle->texels[1]]);
00729     glVertex3f(mesh->_vertices[triangle->vertices[1]].x,
00730                mesh->_vertices[triangle->vertices[1]].y,
00731                mesh->_vertices[triangle->vertices[1]].z);
00732 
00733     glNormal3f(mesh->_normals[triangle->normals[2]].x,
00734                mesh->_normals[triangle->normals[2]].y,
00735                mesh->_normals[triangle->normals[2]].z);
00736     glTexCoord2fv(mesh->_texels[triangle->texels[2]]);
00737     glVertex3f(mesh->_vertices[triangle->vertices[2]].x,
00738                mesh->_vertices[triangle->vertices[2]].y,
00739                mesh->_vertices[triangle->vertices[2]].z);
00740   }
00741   glEnd();
00742 
00743   glColor4f(1,1,1,1);
00744   glDisable(GL_LIGHTING);
00745   glDisable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL);
00746   glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00747   if(skin != NULL)
00748   {
00749     glDisable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00750   }
00751   glDisable(GL_NORMALIZE);
00752   glDepthFunc(GL_LESS);
00753   glPopMatrix();
00754 }
00755 
00756 void eol_mesh_draw_wire(
00757     eolMesh *mesh,
00758     eolVec3D position,
00759     eolVec3D rotation,
00760     eolVec3D scale,
00761     eolVec3D color,
00762     eolFloat alpha
00763   )
00764 {
00765   int i;
00766   eolFace* triangle;
00767   float trans[4];
00768 
00769   if (mesh == NULL)
00770   {
00771     return;
00772   }
00773   glPushMatrix();
00774   trans[3] = alpha;
00775   trans[0] = color.x;
00776   trans[1] = color.y;
00777   trans[2] = color.z;
00778 
00779   glColorMaterial(GL_FRONT,GL_DIFFUSE);
00780   glEnable(GL_NORMALIZE);
00781   glEnable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL);
00782   glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA,GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00783   glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00784 
00785   glDepthFunc(GL_LEQUAL);
00786 
00787   glMaterialfv(GL_FRONT,GL_DIFFUSE,trans);
00788 
00789   glTranslatef(position.x,position.y,position.z);
00790   glRotatef(rotation.x, 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00791   glRotatef(rotation.y, 0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f);
00792   glRotatef(rotation.z, 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00793   glScalef(scale.x,scale.y,scale.z);
00794 
00795   glColor3f(color.x,color.y,color.z);
00796   glBegin(GL_LINES);
00797   for (i = 0; i < mesh->_numFaces; i++)
00798   {
00799     triangle = &mesh->_faces[i];
00800 
00801     glVertex3f(mesh->_vertices[triangle->vertices[0]].x,
00802                mesh->_vertices[triangle->vertices[0]].y,
00803                mesh->_vertices[triangle->vertices[0]].z);
00804     glVertex3f(mesh->_vertices[triangle->vertices[1]].x,
00805                mesh->_vertices[triangle->vertices[1]].y,
00806                mesh->_vertices[triangle->vertices[1]].z);
00807 
00808     glVertex3f(mesh->_vertices[triangle->vertices[1]].x,
00809                mesh->_vertices[triangle->vertices[1]].y,
00810                mesh->_vertices[triangle->vertices[1]].z);
00811     glVertex3f(mesh->_vertices[triangle->vertices[2]].x,
00812                mesh->_vertices[triangle->vertices[2]].y,
00813                mesh->_vertices[triangle->vertices[2]].z);
00814 
00815     glVertex3f(mesh->_vertices[triangle->vertices[2]].x,
00816                mesh->_vertices[triangle->vertices[2]].y,
00817                mesh->_vertices[triangle->vertices[2]].z);
00818     glVertex3f(mesh->_vertices[triangle->vertices[0]].x,
00819                mesh->_vertices[triangle->vertices[0]].y,
00820                mesh->_vertices[triangle->vertices[0]].z);
00821   }
00822   glEnd();
00823 
00824   glColor4f(1,1,1,1);
00825   glDisable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL);
00826   glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00827   glDisable(GL_NORMALIZE);
00828   glDepthFunc(GL_LESS);
00829   glPopMatrix();
00830 }
